title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: VR Simulation Instruction Based on Situated Learning for Health Promotion

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of health management concepts
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can correctly practice healthy dietary choices at least 80% of the time in VR simulation environments
Learners can successfully apply stress management techniques at least three times in virtual daily life scenarios
Learners can sustain at least 150 minutes of moderate-intensity physical activity per week in real-life settings within three months after training completion
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
